temp_shipper_member_bank_card.bankcard_id as temp_shipper_member_bank_card_bankcard_id, temp_shipper_member_bank_card.member_id as temp_shipper_member_bank_card_member_id, temp_shipper_member_bank_card.bank_name as temp_shipper_member_bank_card_bank_name, temp_shipper_member_bank_card.card_name as temp_shipper_member_bank_card_card_name, temp_shipper_member_bank_card.card_number as temp_shipper_member_bank_card_card_number, temp_shipper_member_bank_card.audit_state as temp_shipper_member_bank_card_audit_state, temp_shipper_member_bank_card.audit as temp_shipper_member_bank_card_audit, temp_shipper_member_bank_card.audit_opinion as temp_shipper_member_bank_card_audit_opinion, temp_shipper_member_bank_card.audit_time as temp_shipper_member_bank_card_audit_time, temp_shipper_member_bank_card.remark as temp_shipper_member_bank_card_remark, temp_shipper_member_bank_card.creater as temp_shipper_member_bank_card_creater, temp_shipper_member_bank_card.create_time as temp_shipper_member_bank_card_create_time, temp_shipper_member_bank_card.updater as temp_shipper_member_bank_card_updater, temp_shipper_member_bank_card.update_time as temp_shipper_member_bank_card_update_time

LEFT JOIN t_user temp_creater ON temp_creater.user_id = temp_shipper_member_bank_card.creater LEFT JOIN t_user temp_updater ON temp_updater.user_id = temp_shipper_member_bank_card.updater LEFT JOIN t_shipper_member temp_shipper_member on temp_shipper_member.member_id=temp_shipper_member_bank_card.member_id LEFT JOIN t_user temp_auditor ON temp_auditor.user_id = temp_shipper_member_bank_card.audit
